members.name: importSqlToDb
members.description: Executes a set of SQL statements against the defined database. Can be used to import data defined in the SQL statements into the database, and may additionally include commands to create the table structure.

params.name: sql
params.description: SQL statements to execute against the database

members.name: exportDbToSql
members.description: Exports a SQLite DB as a set of SQL statements.

members.name: importJsonToDb
members.description: Converts table structure and/or row data contained within a JSON structure into SQL statements that can be executed against a SQLite database. Can be used to import data into the database and/or create the table structure.

params.name: json
params.description: JSON structure containing row data and/or table structure as either a JSON object or string

members.name: exportDbToJson
members.description: Exports a SQLite DB as a JSON structure

members.name: wipeDb
members.description: Wipes all data from a database by dropping all existing tables
